# How To Create A Stake Pool Using ARM computers

![](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AItbvmlQnQS9Kt4hNlBBzpwTwMKza8nKhbgLNIGrKgd6=s96-c)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%271103%27%20height=%271117%27/%3e)
![How To Create A Stake Pool Using ARM computers](/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fucarecdn.com%2F154c32e5-bfeb-49fd-b217-d45a5bbb6b09%2F&w=3840&q=75)

We are a community of Cardano stake pool operators & developers who prefer using efficient ARM-based computers. We aim to provide support and free educational resources for the Cardano community.

Although our focus is ARM stake pool operations, we provide a wide range of information, tutorials, and resources for developing on the Cardano blockchain.

For more details, see [ARMada documentation](https://armada-alliance.com/docs).

## 2 contributors

![](https://ucarecdn.com/4f580f1c-e076-45b2-8a8d-af75d20c0cfd/)
![](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AItbvmlQnQS9Kt4hNlBBzpwTwMKza8nKhbgLNIGrKgd6=s96-c)
